response.description: JPM closed at $298.62, up 0.7% on the day and 5.8% this month. A $40 B capital-return plan announced after hours lifted shares another 3.2%. Technicals show price well above 50- and 200-day MAs, RSI at 63, and MACD bullish. Q2 EPS beat by 10.7% and revenue topped estimates, reinforcing momentum.
